modName: House of the Redguard - by DavideMitra
summary: Completely exterior house (no loading screens), unique design and architecture, immersive staged objects, immersive containers, scimitar/shield on back, panoramic view of Solitude. Best house for Redguards and for Anequina Khajiits. Mod status: finished.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=7][B][COLOR=#FF0000][CENTER]House of the Redguard[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][/FONT]
[COLOR=#C00000][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=4]- by DavideMitra -[/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[B][U]NEWS: I'm building House of the Redguard II. It is a bigger and highly superior house, if compared to this one. Here's the Nexus "official mod topic link"[/B][/U]
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1788130-house-of-the-redguard-ii-official-mod-topic/]
Click me
[/url]


[youtube]cfUTtLdpwE4[/youtube]
[youtube]eZvNKoKp6PI[/youtube]


[FONT=Impact][B][COLOR=#FF0000][SIZE=6][CENTER]- THE MISSION -[/CENTER][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/FONT]

[FONT=Comic Sans MS][B][SIZE=4]The mission of House of the Redguard is to bring an original, unique, comfortable and interactable home to all Redguard characters...but also to Anequina Desert Khajiits.[/SIZE][/B][/FONT]





[COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Impact][SIZE=6][CENTER]- MOD FEATURES -[/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]The mod has been completely created with vanilla stuff (except for a modified version of scimitar and shield mesh). Impressively, even if I had to work with vanilla materials, I was able to build an house with unique design and architecture style.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST]
[line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]No loading screens. Completely exterior house.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Cross-legged furniture and panoramic furniture included.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Immersive staged objects: certain objects can change their status (for instance, cooking pot can be toggled on and off...or you can remove clothes from the openable wardrobe). This makes the house completely different, if compared to classical static houses.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Immersive containers: you can interact with a group of objects as they are real containers (for instance, if you'd like to open the books container, you must have a look to the books).
[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Turn on/off an Arabian-themed melody that perfectly fits a Redguard character (it will loop until you decide to stop it).[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Smokable waterpipe.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST]
[line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Wear shield on back or scimitar on back[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST]
[line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]A set of unique strong scimitars, an unique strong shield, some Redguard enchanted clothes and some enchanted rings for your battles[/SIZE][/FONT][/B]



[heading][/heading]
[heading][/heading]

[B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B]
[COLOR=#FF0000][FONT=Impact][SIZE=6][B][CENTER]- WARNINGS -[/CENTER][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[heading][/heading]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]As I already said, the house is completely exterior. That's a cool thing, indeed.
However, I have to warn you that Skyrim rain and snow are not physical effects. You should know that: rain and snow fall anywhere, even if you take cover under a roof. Unfortunatelly, my house isn't invulnerable to precipitations. Just to let you know...
EDIT: Rain and snow are no problem anymore. Download Real Shelter. The author told me that the windmill room I edited is already covered by his project, so, it should work!!! Here's a link to Real Shelter [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52612/?]
Real Shelter
[/url][/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Should you need informations about my mod, just go inside the house and have a look to the bookshelf: inside of it you will find some guides that will explain you anything you need.[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][line][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][/FONT][/B][LIST]
[*][B][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]The mod has been already cleaned with TES5Edit: it is 100% safe to use! ;)[/SIZE][/FONT][/B][/LIST]





[COLOR=#00B050]
[/COLOR]
[COLOR=#00B050][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5][CENTER]!!! HAVE FUN !!![/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
author: DavideMitra
